com.adsboard.repository

Interface AdRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Ad,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Ad,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Ad,java.lang.Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Ad,java.lang.Integer>

    public interface AdRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Ad,java.lang.Integer>
    Project Ads board. This interface is used to manage ads using JpaRepository
    Since:
    October 30, 2015
    Author:
    Oleksandr Lukichov

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Ad> findByRubric(Rubric rubric, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      The method returns a list of ads selected by the rubric, and sorted according to the pageble settings
      java.util.List<Ad> findByRubricAndUserIn(Rubric rubric, java.util.List<User> users, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      The method returns a list of ads selected by the by the rubric and by List of users
      java.util.List<Ad> findByUser(User user)
      The method returns a list of ads selected by the user.

      The method returns a list of ads selected by the user, and sorted according to the pageble settings
      java.util.List<Ad> findByUserAndRubric(User user, Rubric rubric, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      The method returns a list of ads selected by the user and by the rubric and sorted according to the pageble settings
      java.util.List<Ad> findByUserIn(java.util.List<User> users, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      The method returns a list of ads selected by the list of users and by the rubric and sorted according to the pageble settings
